text: James Neil Hamilton (September 9, 1899 - September 24, 1984) was an American actor. He is known for his role as Commissioner Gordon in Batman. During the 1920s he was a minor leading man to major stars. Hamilton was born on September 9, 1899 in Lynn, Massachusetts. He was married to Elsa Whitmer from 1922 until his death in 1984. They had one child. He is a distant cousin of Margaret Hamilton. Hamilton died on September 24, 1984 in Escondido, California from an asthma attack, aged 85. ==Other websites== * * *1966 Batman TV Heroes – Neil Hamilton *1941 They Meet Again – Neil Hamilton as Governor John C. North – at Internet Archive *Photographs of Neil Hamilton * *Hamilton's passport photo, 1924, creepy! title: Neil Hamilton (actor)
